programme.title: Crush the Skull
programme.desc: A pair of thieves find themselves trapped in a house they intended to rob, only to discover they've inadvertently wandered into the lair of a deranged serial killer. Forced now to navigate his sadistic torture den, will they survive?

programme.title: Killer Party
programme.desc: A group of clueless friends become trapped at a baby shower when a sudden zombie apocalypse threatens their lives. Waiting for help to arrive it soon becomes clear that no one is coming.

programme.title: Haus of Horror
programme.desc: Horror is everywhere you look nowadays; have you wondered how that happened? Haus of Horror is here to explore the influence of horror far and wide. From fashion, food, lifestyle to fake blood, Vanessa will cover it all.

programme.title: Nina Forever
programme.desc: The award-winning Blaine brothers give a new meaning to the phrase “Devil’s Threesome” in this darkly comic tale of a deceased girlfriend who returns to haunt a young man to sabotage his new relationship. Winner of Best Feature at FrightFest.

programme.title: JeruZalem
programme.desc: Two American girls on vacation follow a mysterious anthropology student on a trip to Jerusalem. The party is cut short when the trio is caught in the middle of a biblical apocalypse. Trapped between the ancient walls of the holy city, they must find a way out as the fury of hell is unleashed upon them.

programme.title: Mark of the Witch
programme.desc: On her 18th birthday, she will belong to the devil. Compelled by the idea she has an evil twin, a beautiful young woman is driven into a dark underworld of demonic possession, desire, and extreme indulgences when she learns she may be the devil's daughter.

programme.title: The Lodgers
programme.desc: A sinister presence haunts twins to endlessly repeat a long-held family curse as punishment for their ancestors’ sins. When a twin finds love, she rebels against the doctrine, urging the other to stop a horrid legacy.

programme.title: Crush the Skull
programme.desc: A pair of thieves find themselves trapped in a house they intended to rob, only to discover they've inadvertently wandered into the lair of a deranged serial killer. Forced now to navigate his sadistic torture den, will they survive?

programme.title: Killer Party
programme.desc: A group of clueless friends become trapped at a baby shower when a sudden zombie apocalypse threatens their lives. Waiting for help to arrive it soon becomes clear that no one is coming.

programme.title: Dread The Unsolved Season 1
programme.desc: Documentary web series about unexplained mysteries, urbanl egends and unsolved cases originating and/or trending on the internet.

programme.title: Nina Forever
programme.desc: The award-winning Blaine brothers give a new meaning to the phrase “Devil’s Threesome” in this darkly comic tale of a deceased girlfriend who returns to haunt a young man to sabotage his new relationship. Winner of Best Feature at FrightFest.

Trapped between the ancient walls of the holy city, they must find a way out as the fury of hell is unleashed upon them.

programme.title: Mark of the Witch
programme.desc: On her 18th birthday, she will belong to the devil. Compelled by the idea she has an evil twin, a beautiful young woman is driven into a dark underworld of demonic possession, desire, and extreme indulgences when she learns she may be the devil's daughter.

programme.title: The Lodgers
programme.desc: A sinister presence haunts twins to endlessly repeat a long-held family curse as punishment for their ancestors’ sins. When a twin finds love, she rebels against the doctrine, urging the other to stop a horrid legacy.

programme.title: Howling Village
programme.desc: After her brother goes missing, a young psychologist visits an infamous haunted and cursed location known as ‘Howling Village’ to investigate his disappearance and uncover her family’s dark history.

programme.title: Redcon-1
programme.desc: A squad of special forces soldiers infiltrate a quarantine zone to rescue a scientist who holds the cure to save mankind.

programme.title: Killd My Wife
programme.desc: The morning after a drunken night out, Jeong-hos wife is found dead. All the evidence points to him but insists hes innocent - even though he can't remember a thing. Questioned by a detective, Jeong-ho must recreate and relive his fateful evening, and slowly starts questioning himself. His wifes killer is somewhere in his memories, but what if a drunken blackout is hiding his own guilt?
